metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3121 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: rxvt-unicode before 9.20 does not properly handle OSC escape sequences, which allows user-assisted remote attackers to manipulate arbitrary X window properties and execute arbitrary commands.

criterions.comment: rxvt-unicode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
